接口的使用
org.apache.http.auth.AuthScheme

  • 使用AuthScheme的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.http.auth
    Client HTTP authentication APIs.
    org.apache.http.client
    Client HTTP communication APIs.
    org.apache.http.impl.auth
    Default implementations of standard and common HTTP authentication schemes.
    org.apache.http.impl.auth.win
    Auth scheme that makes use of JNA to implement Negotiate and NTLM on Windows Platforms.
    org.apache.http.impl.client
    Default HTTP client implementation.

    • org.apache.http.auth中AuthScheme的使用

      org.apache.http.auth中AuthScheme的子接口 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  ContextAwareAuthScheme
      This interface represents an extended authentication scheme that requires access to HttpContext in order to generate an authorization string.
      返回AuthScheme的org.apache.http.auth中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      AuthScheme AuthSchemeProvider.create(HttpContext context)
      Creates an instance of AuthScheme.
      AuthScheme AuthState.getAuthScheme()
      Returns actual AuthScheme.
      AuthScheme AuthOption.getAuthScheme() 
      AuthScheme AuthSchemeRegistry.getAuthScheme(String name, HttpParams params)
      已过时。 
      Gets the authentication scheme with the given name.
      AuthScheme AuthSchemeFactory.newInstance(HttpParams params)
      已过时。 
      Creates an instance of AuthScheme using given HTTP parameters.
      参数类型为AuthScheme的org.apache.http.auth中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void AuthState.setAuthScheme(AuthScheme authScheme)
      已过时。 
      (4.2) use AuthState.update(AuthScheme, Credentials)
      void AuthState.update(AuthScheme authScheme, Credentials credentials)
      Updates the auth state with AuthScheme and Credentials.
      参数类型为AuthScheme的org.apache.http.auth中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      AuthOption(AuthScheme authScheme, Credentials creds) 

    • org.apache.http.client中AuthScheme的使用

      返回AuthScheme的org.apache.http.client中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      AuthScheme AuthCache.get(HttpHost host) 
      AuthScheme AuthenticationHandler.selectScheme(Map<String,Header> challenges, HttpResponse response, HttpContext context)
      已过时。 
      Selects one authentication challenge out of all available and creates and generates AuthScheme instance capable of processing that challenge.
      参数类型为AuthScheme的org.apache.http.client中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void AuthenticationStrategy.authFailed(HttpHost authhost, AuthScheme authScheme, HttpContext context)
      Callback invoked in case of unsuccessful authentication.
      void AuthenticationStrategy.authSucceeded(HttpHost authhost, AuthScheme authScheme, HttpContext context)
      Callback invoked in case of successful authentication.
      void AuthCache.put(HttpHost host, AuthScheme authScheme) 

    • org.apache.http.impl.auth中AuthScheme的使用

      实现AuthScheme的org.apache.http.impl.auth中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  AuthSchemeBase
      Abstract authentication scheme class that serves as a basis for all authentication schemes supported by HttpClient.
      class  BasicScheme
      Basic authentication scheme as defined in RFC 2617.
      class  DigestScheme
      Digest authentication scheme as defined in RFC 2617.
      class  GGSSchemeBase 
      class  KerberosScheme
      KERBEROS authentication scheme.
      class  NegotiateScheme
      已过时。 
      (4.2) use SPNegoScheme or KerberosScheme.
      class  NTLMScheme
      NTLM is a proprietary authentication scheme developed by Microsoft and optimized for Windows platforms.
      class  RFC2617Scheme
      Abstract authentication scheme class that lays foundation for all RFC 2617 compliant authentication schemes and provides capabilities common to all authentication schemes defined in RFC 2617.
      class  SPNegoScheme
      SPNEGO (Simple and Protected GSSAPI Negotiation Mechanism) authentication scheme.
      返回AuthScheme的org.apache.http.impl.auth中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      AuthScheme SPNegoSchemeFactory.create(HttpContext context) 
      AuthScheme NTLMSchemeFactory.create(HttpContext context) 
      AuthScheme KerberosSchemeFactory.create(HttpContext context) 
      AuthScheme DigestSchemeFactory.create(HttpContext context) 
      AuthScheme BasicSchemeFactory.create(HttpContext context) 
      AuthScheme SPNegoSchemeFactory.newInstance(HttpParams params) 
      AuthScheme NegotiateSchemeFactory.newInstance(HttpParams params)
      已过时。 
       
      AuthScheme NTLMSchemeFactory.newInstance(HttpParams params) 
      AuthScheme KerberosSchemeFactory.newInstance(HttpParams params) 
      AuthScheme DigestSchemeFactory.newInstance(HttpParams params) 
      AuthScheme BasicSchemeFactory.newInstance(HttpParams params)
